Transform your Educational processes With Thooto

Built on advanced educational technology, institutions use Thooto to deliver engaging video-first learning experiences efficiently and effectively.

Get Started Let's Talk

Start free trial. * No credit card required.

Easy & Fast Setup

  • Streamline your educational
    processes

    You can work seamlessly with your existing systems, simplifying your transition to Thooto.

  • Powerful features

    Easily digitize, manage, and launch your educational programs. Thooto supports both formative and summative assessments, which can be marked directly on the platform.

  • Advanced Functionality

    Tailor any aspect of your courses and administrative processes. We also help compile Portfolios of Evidence (POE) and manage Statements of Result (SOR).

Dedicated Learning Management Platform

From onboarding to certification, Thooto makes educational management straightforward and comprehensive.

  • Student onboarding
  • Course management
  • Video content delivery
  • Assessment and reporting
  • Document storage (including student contracts, IDs, and SARS documents)
  • Compliance tracking with QCTO standards
Book A Demo
  • Onboarding
  • Courses
  • Videos

Why Thooto

Do more with an end-to-end solution

Formative and Summative Assessments

Thooto supports both formative and summative assessments, which can be marked directly on the platform, ensuring continuous student evaluation.

Statements of Result (SOR)

Easily manage and generate Statements of Result, keeping track of student achievements and ensuring compliance.

Portfolios of Evidence (POE)

Compile comprehensive Portfolios of Evidence for students, simplifying the documentation of their learning journey.

EISA Enrolment and QCTO Compliance

Collect all required student information for EISA enrolment and generate QCTO-compliant spreadsheets, ensuring that your institution meets all regulatory standards.

Advanced Analytics

Track student progress and performance throughout the course with detailed analytics, helping educators make informed decisions.

Document Storage

Store all student documents, including IDs, SARS documents, and contracts, in one place, reducing reliance on paper and improving accessibility.
